column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Near the end of the meal
column2: we were trying to get the waiter's attention to bring us more drinks and look at the dessert menu
column3: but he was busy busing tables and talking to other patrons?  Kind of annoying
column4: especially when there are 5 men at a table.  If you're going to drop $1000 for dinner
column5: you shouldn't need to wait for your waiter to bus tables.
